name: nativescript-toast
description: A NativeScript Toast Plugin for Android and iOS apps.

scripts.clean: git checkout samples/angular/package.json && rm -rf node_modules target tmp && mkdir -p tmp && mkdir -p tmp/angular && cd samples/angular && rm -rf node_modules hooks platforms
scripts.test: cd tmp/angular && cp -rp ../../samples/angular/* . && rm -rf platforms node_modules hooks && tns plugin add ../.. && tns install && tns build ios && tns build android
scripts.pre-e2e: cd samples/angular && tns install && tns platform add ios && tns platform add android && tns build ios && tns build android
scripts.changelog:add: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:pre: npm run clean && npm run test
scripts.release:post: npm run changelog && npm run changelog:add
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish

author: Tobias Hennig <tobias.hennig1@gmail.com> (https://github.com/TobiasHennig)
